expo.name: Athletia
expo.description: Athletia is a platform which provides the foundation for increasing the relationship between fans and sport organizations, by providing a unique fan focused platform which benefits both the fans themselves and the organizations who uses this platform. Athletia`s main goal is to increase attendance at sports events and drives fan satisfaction and well-being for any organization which uses its platform.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Athletia to access your photos.

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app requires access to your location to allow you to set the location of your sports team or club, enabling other users to find the sport facility easily. Your location data is only used within the app for this purpose and is not shared with third parties
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow Athletia to access your photos for setting profile pictures and team logos, personalizing your user experience.
